questions.quote: Mrs Seinfeld, please. I am begging you. Put the air conditioner on.
I still want to know what happened to that birthday card? Now, Morgan, did you ever sign it?
Yeah, I just wanna run and get a beer. I'll be back in a minute.
Yeah, too bad he didn't get shot. He could have been the one.
Aw, c'mon Kramer, this is ridiculous. I'm not gonna put these on.
Ah no no no no no. A better way to reach the bra would be to undo the jacket, then go around the back of the shirt.
Carrie, could you do me a favour? Could you not mention this to your mother?
Oh, excuse me.    What have you been doing, I've been smacking myself senseless.  People think I'm a mental patient.
You're a back-up, you're a second-line, a just-in-case, a B-plan, a contingency!
Well, I don't really know where The Stooges are right now but if I locate them you will be the first to know.
